imdb.plot outline: Milestones of Champions: The Journeys of Canada's Paralympians is a three-part mini-series featuring an in-depth look at Canada's Paralympians. It encapsulates the heart and soul of each athlete by highlighting the major challenges and milestones of their athletic careers, while also enabling them to send Canadians their message about participating in sports and living life to its fullest regardless of physical ability.
imdb.title: Milestones of Champions: The Journeys of Canada's Paralympians
akas: Milestones of Champions: The Journeys of Canada's Paralympians (Canada)
plot: _Milestones of Champions: The Journeys of Canada's Paralympians_ (qv) is a three-part mini-series featuring an in-depth look at Canada's Paralympians. It encapsulates the heart and soul of each athlete by highlighting the major challenges and milestones of their athletic careers, while also enabling them to send Canadians their message about participating in sports and living life to its fullest regardless of physical ability.::Andrew M. Morris
